reviewText: I enjoyed this video. I like learning new things and it is easy to follow.
I really enjoyed watching these videos.  They were much better than I thought they would be.  They contained a lot of great herbalist practices from a mother's perspective.
Our family owns this DVD (as well as volume 1) and we absolutely enjoy it!  It's super educational, fun, and a great tool for learning about the world of holistic medicine and herbs.
